name: latiosite
effect: Held: Allows Latios to Mega Evolve into Mega Latios.
short_effect: Held: Allows Latios to Mega Evolve into Mega Latios.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Latios hold it, and this stone will enable it to
Mega Evolve during battle.
